Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

Me and a few friends have been trying the demo for a couple of days, having great fun trying to make various zany and not so zany rockets. Great fun.

Finally decided to get the \'real\' version. (It\'s downloading). I\'m guessing the rest will join me in that soon enough. Anyway, it\'s genius. Lego spacecraft, but with more kablooie.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Hope you have some real fun, enjoy the game, and welcome aboard!
